replies.text: Article II, Section 4 establishes that the President, Vice President, and all civil officers of the United States can be removed from office through impeachment for treason, bribery, or other high crimes and misdemeanors.

We’re all disgusted but unfortunately not surprised. The president is not well. We expect Democrats to fight back with everything they have got to stop this ruthless regime from destroying our democracy further. Americans are angry.

posts.text:
Trump’s immigration chaos needs to end. ICE must stop claiming powers it doesn’t have under law or the Constitution. 

Dems are standing up to rein in ICE with real accountability & reforms. Republicans must join us.

replies.text:
Thank you Senator. But we, your constituents, don't want reforms of ICE. ICE is a structural threat to our democracy. Structural threats can't be reformed. We ask that you vote no on any package that funds ICE. ICE must be defunded and abolished.

#defundICE

Reform will not work.  Congress has already shown they cannot control a rogue agency like ICE.  Congress must re-direct ICE funding to other agencies and deny any future funding for the agency who's primary goal is to inflict terror on Americans for political purposes.  Abolish ICE.

posts.text: Another example of Pres. Trump disregarding the Constitution in pursuit of his personal political aims.

posts.text: Instead of using the powers of the presidency to help Americans, Trump is abusing his power to line his own pockets.

replies.text: In 1599, a Spanish governor in early colonial Ecuador suffered this fate. Jivaro tribe, executed the gold hungry governor by pouring molten gold down his throat.Pouring hot liquids or metals, such as gold, into the mouth of a victim was a practice used by the Romans and the Spanish Inquisition.
Biden had the power to stop him and didn't. Now we all suffer.

posts.text: As we kickoff #BlackHistoryMonth, we highlight some of the special people and stories that shaped Rhode Island and America. There are many exciting opportunities to join the celebration. Learn more:

It’s been a month since Republicans sent health premiums skyrocketing. Now, over 1 million Americans have been priced out of their coverage & millions more are struggling to stay insured. 

Senate Republicans could end this today by passing the bipartisan House-passed bill.
